name: Smoked Salmon Dip
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: dill, drained yogurt, horseradish, smoked salmon, yogurt, low calorie, low-fat
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound smoked salmon, skinned and cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the smoked salmon and cheese in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Fold in the horseradish and dill. Serve with crackers.
